subject: Tests (Drug Use)
Doping (Sports)
Football
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. and its players union continued trading barbs about the league’s drug testing regimen and the implementation of a preliminary test for human growth hormone.
snippet: The N.F.L. and its players union continued trading barbs about the league’s drug testing regimen and the implementation of a preliminary test for human growth hormone.
